resources.string:
gtestParser Usage:

 1) Copy gtestPaser.apk file to SUT and install it with pm command.
 #pm install gparser.apk

 2) Run test program and generate XML report to the specified path and file name.
 #[path]/TestToRun -\-gtest_output=xml:/data/data/org.linaro.gparser/files/TestResults.xml

 3) Close and re-run gtestParser manually or use am command.
 #am force-stop org.linaro.gparser
 #am start -n org.linaro.gparser/.MainActivity

 4) Find ParsedTestResults.txt file in directory /data/data/org.linaro.gparser/files/
